DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate impact specifically design leg brace walk endurance individual Parkinson 's disease .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Walking Practice Persons With PD
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , repeat measure , match group study . There three group participant , 20 participant per group , 60 participant total . Group one ( G1 ) receive custom-fabricated bilateral brace standardize home walking/exercise program . Group two ( G2 ) receive off-the shelf ankle support standardize home walking/exercise program . Group three ( G3 ) receive standardized walking/exercise program without brace AFO . Subjects randomize upon enrollment study . Subjects follow one year study outcome measure collect 3 time course study . Subjects see every 6 month duration study test well visit note table .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Confirmed diagnosis Parkinson 's Disease accord UK brain bank criteria.5 2 . Age 30 90 . 3 . Ability walk 150 foot independently level surface without assistive device . 4 . Hoehn Yahr stage 14 . 5 . Less 10 full heel raise single limb stance bilaterally . 6 . Adequate insurance/funding pay physical therapy evaluation AFO device . 1 . Body mass index great 40 . 2 . Passive dorsiflexion range motion less approximately neutral ( 90 degree ) 3 . Any uncontrolled health condition gait training contraindicate
